title: 请问领地插件如何禁止玩家创建领地？
author: andrewshi
txt_content: 就是在config里设置成只允许OP创建领地

replies.author: Kamoeth
replies.txt_content:
andrewshi 发表于 2013-12-8 04:10 
修改cancreate可不可以起到同样的效果啊？
那个是允许创建领地的开关……好吧倒也的确可以的

replies.author: Kamoeth
replies.txt_content:
Groups:
    Default: #group name
       # Information about the Residence zone that the player can define.
       #Uncomment the lines below to mirror this config to other groups.
       #Mirror:
         #- 'group1'
         #- 'group2'
       Residence:
           # Determins if this group can create residences or not.  This option can be overriden with the permissions node 'residence.create'
           CanCreate: true
           # The maximum number of Residences a player can have.
           MaxResidences: 2复制代码把这一段的最后一行的值改为0就好了

replies.author: andrewshi
replies.txt_content:
Kamoeth 发表于 2013-12-7 17:02 
把这一段的最后一行的值改为0就好了
修改cancreate可不可以起到同样的效果啊？

replies.author: andrewshi
replies.txt_content:
Kamoeth 发表于 2013-12-7 11:04 
那个是允许创建领地的开关……好吧倒也的确可以的
分就给你了！！！话说就你一人回复啊......
